name: InfoLabelTweaks
description: Adds additional information to GD's Info Label. (Formerly part of ErysEdits.)

blendingDebugText.name: Readable Mode (Stronger Blending)
blendingDebugText.description:
Make the info label easier to read across a far larger variety of scenarios.

<cy>(Make sure to check out the other options below this one!)</c>

debugTextAlpha.name: Adjust Alpha/Opacity
debugTextAlpha.description: Sets the info label's opacity. Minimum is 150 (as seen in vanilla Geometry Dash).

maxAlphaDebugText.name: Max Opacity
maxAlphaDebugText.description:
Maxes the info label's opacity. This quick toggle is here in case you'd like to briefly see your info label at maximum opacity without having to remember what your preferred value for the "Adjust Alpha/Opacity" setting was.

<cy>(If this is enabled, your setting for "Adjust Alpha/Opacity" will be ignored.)</c>

chromaDebugText.name: Chroma Mode
chromaDebugText.description:
<cl>Original code by ItzKiba.</c>

Sets the color of the info label to that of a rainbow, as a last ditch effort to make the info label readable under every imaginable circumstance without flooding your Geode logs.

chromaDebugTextSpeed.name: Chroma Speed
chromaDebugTextSpeed.description: Sets how quickly (lower value)/slowly (higher value) the info label changes color if "Chroma Mode" is enabled.

customScale.name: Scale
customScale.description: Sets the scale of the info label. Default is 0.5 (as seen in vanilla Geometry Dash).

spaceUKScale.name: SpaceUK Scale
spaceUKScale.description:
Sets your debug scale to <cj>(0.5 * (940 / 1004))</c>. This toggle enables the default scale for the info label previously seen in in ErysEdits.

<cy>(If this is enabled, your setting for "Scale" will be ignored.)</c>

textAlignRight.name: Align Right (Text Content)
textAlignRight.description: Aligns the text contents of the info label to the right.

positionAlignRight.name: Align Right (Position)
positionAlignRight.description: Aligns the position of the info label towards the right side of the screen.

gameplayHeader.name: Add "Gameplay" Header
gameplayHeader.description: Adds a "-- Gameplay --" header to the first section.

jumps.name: Include Jumps
jumps.description: Includes your current session's jump count (stylized like <cy>[this]</c>) next to your "Taps"/"Clicks"/"Actions" label.

attemptTime.name: Include Attempt Time
attemptTime.description: Includes the time spent on your current attempt (stylized like <cy>[this]</c>) next to your "Time" label.

accuratePosition.name: Accurate Player Position
accuratePosition.description:
Adds four more decimal points to the player's X and Y positions in the first section.

<cy>(If you want accurate player positions while your player's X or Y position is in the negatives, consider buying MegaHack v8 instead; levels won't let you get there anyways without a start position.)</c>

playerStatus.name: Player Status
playerStatus.description: Includes info about the player's current status.

compactDirections.name: Player Direction as Emoticons
compactDirections.description:
Replaces word descriptions of the player's current direction with emoticon alternatives.

<cy>Requires the previous setting ("Add Player Info") to be enabled; otherwise you won't see it.</c>

levelTraits.name: Level Traits
levelTraits.description: Includes info about the current level's traits.

lastPlayedSong.name: Show Most Recent Song/Effect
lastPlayedSong.description:
Includes the filename of the most recently loaded song in the Audio section.

<cy>This setting is currently unavailable on macOS.</c>

audioFromMods.name: Include Songs/Effects from Mods
audioFromMods.description:
If "Show Most Recent Song/Effect" is enabled, songs and SFX file names from other Geode mods will appear in the Audio section. Disabling this will simply show "[Geode mod]" instead.

<cy>This setting is currently unavailable on macOS.</c>

cameraProperties.name: Camera Properties
cameraProperties.description: Adds an additional section of info related to the camera's state (named "Camera"), including zoom, rotation, position, shake factor, and offset.

geodeInfo.name: Geode Mod Loader Info
geodeInfo.description: Adds an additional section of info related to your Geode setup named "Geode".

compactAudio.name: Compact "Audio" Section
compactAudio.description: Condenses Song and SFX counts from the "Audio" section into one line.

compactGameplay.name: Compact "Gameplay" Section
compactGameplay.description:
Condenses several pieces of information in the first section into one line, including:
- Attempts and taps/clicks.
- TimeWarp and Gravity.
- X and Y position.
- Gradients and Particles.

compactCamera.name: Compact "Camera" Section
compactCamera.description:
<cp>Whenever possible</c>, this option condenses the camera's Zoom and Angle info (from the mod's custom "Camera" section) into one line.

<cy>"Camera Properties" needs to be enabled first.</c>

compactGeode.name: Compact "Geode" Section
compactGeode.description:
Condenses your mod counts (from the mod's custom "Geode" section) into one line.

<cy>"Geode Mod Loader Info" needs to be enabled first.</c>

conditionalValues.name: Conditional Labels
conditionalValues.description:
Hides various values if unmodified. For reference:
- TimeWarp if currently equal to 1.
- Gravity if currently equal to 1.
- Anything equal to either "0" or "0 / 0".

<cy>This also applies to this mod's "-- Camera --" section if this is enabled.</c>

customFooter.name: Custom Footer
customFooter.description:
Add your own custom text to appear at the very end of the info label, stylized <cl>-- [like this] --</c>. Leave this setting at its default value (an empty string) to disable this setting.

<cy>Only the first 20 characters of what you set here will be accepted.</c>

logDebugText.name: Enable Logging
logDebugText.description:
Logs the info label into your Geode logs folder.

<cr>By enabling this option, you agree to hold harmless the mod developer (RayDeeUx) or any lead developer of Geode and assume all responsibility for any resulting damages, including incredibly large log files.</c>
